method.name: i_cal_array_compare
i_cal_array_new

parameter.name: element_size
parameter.comment: The size of the element of the array

parameter.name: increment_size
parameter.comment: The incremental size when the array is full

returns.comment: The newly create #ICalArray with the properties set by @element_size and @increment_size

method.comment: Create a #ICalArray with the element size to be @element_size and increment size to be @increment_size

method.name: i_cal_array_copy

returns.comment: The newly cloned #ICalArray with the same value as the @array

method.comment: Create a deep copy of #ICalArray with the same properties as the @array

method.name: i_cal_array_append

parameter.name: element
parameter.comment: The element to be appended to the #ICalArray

method.comment: Append @element to the end of the array

method.name: i_cal_array_remove_element_at

parameter.name: position
parameter.comment: The position in which the element will be removed from the array

method.comment: Remove the element at the @position from the array

method.name: i_cal_array_element_at

parameter.name: position
parameter.comment: The position the target element is located

returns.comment: The element located at the @position in the @array

method.comment: Get the element located in the @position in the @array. NULL if position if out of bound

method.name: i_cal_array_sort

parameter.name: (const void *, const void *)
parameter.comment: The compare function which is used to sort the array

method.comment: Does not work right now. Sort the @array using the sort function @compare
